body: I realize that, if we're still keeping the EnergyPlus component in the tab, we should fix the bugs in it.  I still recommend using the OpenStudio component but you can see that I fixed the bug here: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/honeybee/commit/5d1689daaadf6b3...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/honeybee/commit/5d1689daaadf6b3bb4bb7a721bf7ab25d05e261f) And the attached file works: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KwJ2appcijHXHnn7oy4dI4BwEi1T4wc8ukGLrzO1Q29-dsh*DlWsgPs96*NEbZpB18CQMm*wLVgd2qrY5Kr4jRhu13RMYR5G/IdealAirBugfix.JPG) Thanks for bringing this to our attention. -Chris
